alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 1:53PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Brevard and east central Osceola Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 153 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Kennedy Space Center to Cape Canaveral to 8 miles east of Holopaw. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Rockledge, Cocoa and Cocoa Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
